title: The 5 Skills of Successful PhD Students
description:
A PhD is not only a test of professional aptitude but also a test of character. Looking back at my time as a PhD student, I can say that it has been a taxing but equally rewarding time that I wouldnâ€™t exchange for anything in the world. Doing a PhD has not only improved my scientific and technical understanding but has also strengthened my character.
In this post I describe five characteristics that I found to be helpful in successfully completing my PhD.
